Name: Snowman Head: Huff-and-Puff
Desc: A snowman head whose cheeks are puffed up in anger. Can be used to make a Puffy Snowman.\nIt is said that the very first snowman of this kind was built by an Outrider who used her good friend's default expression as reference. Her friend's response to this flattering imitation? Laughter. Surprising laughter.
